text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I've already taken care of making my first appearance to the everyone in the audience. So, from next year onwards――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The battle of a lifetime! Now, it's time for my Classic battlefield to begin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, now, how shall we rush forward into the Satsuki Sho!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As I thought, it's make-or-break!? Going straight in, zero prep, would be pretty Bakushin-esque, wouldn't it!
choice_data_list: Isn't that a little too Bakushin-esque!?

text_block_list.text: As one might expect, the Satsuki Sho is much too abrupt of a challenge, so if we just follow the original plan, the first race would be…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ohh―! That is a race for the very best Uma Musume, in anticipation of the Satsuki Sho!
Spring Stakes, 1800 meters. It's a long distance for Sakura Bakushin O, but it'll give her time to think before Satsuki Sho.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, yes, this is an honor student's choice race!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: All right, next stop, the Spring Stakes!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: With my speed, I can run 1800 meters in an instant!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: If it's been decided! I need to train for middle distances ASAP!
